delivery_time.title: 1. Delivery Time
text: We offer instant delivery! The average delivery time is between 15 to 60 minutes after order confirmation. The time may vary depending on courier availability and road conditions.

delivery_methods.title: 2. Delivery Methods
text: We offer only courier delivery. Our couriers will promptly deliver your order to the specified address.

delivery_cost.title: 3. Delivery Cost
delivery_cost.text: Delivery cost is calculated automatically at checkout and depends on:
details: Possible additional conditions (e.g., delivery to remote areas)

tracking.title: 4. Order Tracking
text: You can track your order status in your personal account ('My Orders' section) or via the tracking link sent after order confirmation.

delays.title: 5. What to do if delivery is delayed?
delays.text: If your order has not arrived within the estimated time, please contact our support team:

damaged_items.title: 6. Damaged or Lost Items
text: If your item arrives damaged, take a photo and send it to us via email. We will review your case and offer a replacement or refund.

contact.text: If you have any questions about delivery, contact us:
